meanings: (주위의 상태) environment, circumstances, surroundings, climate, (formal) milieu

vlive.korean: '메뉴를 남기면 환경부담금 NO!' "If you leave food behind, environmental charges, NO!" 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] MOON JONGUP X Eating Show - 문종업 X 같이 먹어요
vlive.english: "If you leave food behind, environmental charges, NO!"

vlive.korean: 환경부담 벌칙을 받으라는 소리죠? You want me to get the environmental penalty, right? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] LEE JIN HYUK X Eating Show - 이진혁 X 같이 먹어요
vlive.english: You want me to get the environmental penalty, right?

vlive.korean: 돌렸어 돌렸어 - 플라스틱은 환경 오염된다고요? He heated it... - Plastic is harmful to environment? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 아로하 4살 축하해♡
vlive.english: He heated it... - Plastic is harmful to environment?

vlive.korean: 약속대로 아까 말한 환경부담 벌칙을 받아야죠? as promised, I have to get the environmental penalty, right? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] MOON JONGUP X Eating Show - 문종업 X 같이 먹어요
vlive.english: as promised, I have to get the environmental penalty, right?

vlive.korean: 주의할 점은 메뉴를 남기면 환경부담금 노! One thing to keep in mind, there is no environmental charge if you have left overs! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Apink 9th Anniversary x - 에이핑크 데뷔 9주년 기념 <같이 먹어요>
vlive.english: One thing to keep in mind, there is no environmental charge if you have left overs!

examples.english: the awakening of interest in the environment 발음

examples.korean: These ferns will grow best in a humid atmosphere. 발음듣기 이 양치류들은 습한 환경에서 가장 잘 자란다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These ferns will grow best in a humid atmosphere. 발음

examples.korean: the debate over the effects of heredity and environment 발음듣기 유전과 환경의 영향에 대한 논쟁 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the debate over the effects of heredity and environment 발음

examples.korean: Bad housing, debt and poverty are interconnected. 발음듣기 열악한 주거 환경, 부채 및 빈곤은 상호 연관되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Bad housing, debt and poverty are interconnected. 발음
